question: Who was prime Minister of England when Simon Commission came to India to review the working of Government of India Act 1919?
explanation: The Indian Statutory Commission or the Simon Commission was constituted in 1927 to review the working of Government of India Act 1919. Simon Commission came to India on on 4th February 1928. Stanley Baldwin was the Prime Minister of England that time. He served as the prime minister of England from 1924 to 1929.
